hotels.title: Elegant Gold Coast Suites & Apartments with Onsite Pool Club & Wellness Spa
hotels.description: Soaked in sunlight and just steps from the surf at Burleigh Beach, this elegant coastal retreat blends crisp modern design with the laidback rhythm of one of Australia’s most iconic beach towns. Inside, its studios, suites and apartments are light and airy with coastal-inspired design that echoes its surrounds. Spend long afternoons at Haven Pool Club with a drink in hand and fresh seafood on the table or ease into an Italian feast at LiTO, the hotel’s welcoming all-day trattoria. Between ocean dips and DJ-backed sunsets, guests can unwind at the cutting-edge CIEL Spa with a treatment or dip in the magnesium pools, or simply take in Burleigh's pine-lined streets, pristine beaches and buzzing cafes.
